author: lgo
msg: Refactor test code, extract the client and server context loops in a helper
(test_helper_run_requests): Helper function, runs client and server context
https_set_root_ca_conn_setup): Replace all context loops with a call to the
new helper function. Update the surrounding code where needed.

author: lgo
msg: Adapt the certificate validation code so that the two new ssl tests succeed.
(struct sectrans_context_t): Add pool and anchor_certs members, the first is
(sectrans_init_context): Use calloc instead of alloc to create the context,
this ensure anchor_certs is set to NULL. Create a pool for this context.
(validate_server_certificate): Load the trusted certificates to evaluate the
server certificate. Log all validation errors. Don't use a separate
failure code if there are no errors (compatibility with openssl buckets).
(trust_cert): Add the trusted certificate to the cache so it can be passed
to the S.T. library at a later moment.
